Bayonne.Arthur Kill Vertical Lift Bridge: The Arthur Kill Vertical Lift Railroad Bridge is a rail vertical-lift bridge connecting Elizabethport, New Jersey and the Howland Hook Marine Terminal on Staten Island, New York, United States. The bridge was built by the Baltimore and Ohio Railroad in 1959 to replace a the Arthur Kill Bridge, a swing bridge opened in 1890. The single-track bridge parallels the Goethals Bridge, which carries Interstate 278.
